participant_1.background:
I'm not particularly tall, but I'm taller than my grandparents.
my children are a dissapointment.
I'm not so worried about the weather because I don't have kids.
I'm worried about not being able to keep any food down and losing too much weight.
i was the first test child for sesame street.

participant_2.background:
I enjoyed a nice walk outside to appreciate the weather.
i love cooking.
I am married to another viking descendant and we have many children.
I enjoy wearing my cat-eye glasses while training to compete in the Olympics.
i visit comic con.

content.text: I was the first test child for Sesame Street!
That's so cool! I love Sesame Street! Do you know how much you're worth?
I'm not sure! Why? What's the going rate for test children?
Well, I don't know, but I would assume it's worth a lot! You helped create a part of American history!
I never thought of it that way! I guess you're right!
I'm glad I could make you see the light! I'm also glad you're not worried about the weather! I love taking walks outside when the weather is nice.
I'm not so worried about the weather because I don't have kids.
Well, when you have kids, you have to worry about things like them getting sick or getting hurt. When you don't have kids, you don't have to worry about those things.
That makes sense! I guess I'll have to keep that in mind when I decide to have kids someday.
Thanks for the advice! I'm glad I met you!
You too! I'm glad we had this conversation!
